extendedInfo.description: Open the app and show playing cards on your mobile to s spectator. The cards are shuffled and you are looking at the back side of screen. Let him choose one card (you don't know which card he has chosen, yet), now perform the magic you'll be able to tell what card he had in mind. You can exactly tell the number and suit of that card. This is one of the few magic apps that can actually be performed using phone. It's very useful to start conversation with strangers, to impress your friends. It's nice app to have in mobile. Enjoy. Detailed instructions are given in the app. If you have any suggestions/issues, mail us at contact@dexterltd.comCheck out our other magic apps at http://androidmagicapps.comKeywords: Magic, magician, impress friends, card, trick, houdini, mind, reader, freak, candle magic , bulb magic, balloon pop magic, balloon fly magic, number magic.
